personalInfo.splInterest: Watching science videos, beach, going out with friends, playing with his dogs
personalInfo.clubAffl: Marine Park GC (Brooklyn, NY) Laurel Oak (Sarasota, FL)

tourBios.curYrHigh: Joined PGA TOUR LatinoamĂŠrica at the Bogota Q-School in January. Finished in a tie for the 11th spot and edged Scott Lamb in a playoff to secure exempt status for the first half of the season.
tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Played his first few months as a professional on West Florida Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at Penn State, where he earned Academic All-American honors... A three-time New York City High School champion.
tourBios.personal: His biggest thrill in golf was playing the First Tee Open with Nick Price... Favorite golf memory is playing Bethpage with his grandfather... The NY Yankees, the Brooklyn Nets and the NY Knicks are his favorite pro teams... He would like to trade places for a day with the President of the U.S. to "see what it takes."... Twitter name is @xandermac_... Instagram name is @xandermcsmith... Snapshat is xandermc
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)
